alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:49PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds will impact portions of northeastern Carbon County through 330 PM MDT... At 248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty outflow winds along a line extending from near Bates Hole to 7 miles southeast of Seminoe Campground to 10 miles west of Rawlins. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Hanna, Sinclair, Seminoe Campground, Battle Mountain, Shirley Basin, Seminoe Dam and Separation Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 200 and 252. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
